total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the pattern of numbers in the input grid.
Q2: Determine the pattern of the numbers in the rows and columns.
Q3: Identify the pattern of the zeros in the input grid.
Q4: Determine how the pattern of zeros affects the pattern of numbers in the output grid.
Q5: Identify the pattern of the numbers in the output grid.
Q6: Determine how to transform the input grid into the output grid based on the identified patterns.
Q1: Identify the pattern of numbers in the input grid.
Q2: Identify the areas where the pattern is interrupted by zeros.
Q3: Determine the pattern of numbers that should replace the zeros.
Q4: Replace the zeros with the correct pattern of numbers.
Q5: Ensure the pattern of numbers continues seamlessly after the replacement.
